title: Add "Made by Anuj" credit line to Cap Clicker footer

requirements.summary: Append a final footer credit line "Made by Anuj" in the Cap Clicker main game view without changing gameplay logic or layout.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Cap Clicker main screen footer, the text "Made by Anuj" is visible to users.
The credit appears as the last line/item in the footer content (i.e., after the existing copyright and caffeine.ai link).
The added text uses the existing footer styling (or a compatible subtle style) and does not break the layout on mobile or desktop.

file_operations.description: Update the existing footer JSX to add a new final line/item with the exact text "Made by Anuj" after the existing caffeine.ai credit link, using compatible existing Tailwind/footer styling and ensuring responsive layout remains intact.
